title: Settings
resetDescription: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default values? All current customizations will be lost.

pharmacyName.label: Pharmacy Name
pharmacyName.description: Official pharmacy name displayed in the system

autoArchiveDays.label: Auto Archive Days
autoArchiveDays.description: Days after delivery to auto-archive order (0 = disable)

requireCustomerPhone.label: Require Customer Phone
requireCustomerPhone.description: Is customer phone required when creating an order?

allowedMedicineForms.label: Allowed Medicine Forms
allowedMedicineForms.description: Medicine forms that can be added to orders

maxMedicinesPerOrder.label: Max Medicines Per Order
maxMedicinesPerOrder.description: Maximum number of medicines in a single order

maxDeliveryDays.label: Maximum Delivery Days
maxDeliveryDays.description: Maximum acceptable days for order delivery from supplier

requireSupplierEmail.label: Require Supplier Email
requireSupplierEmail.description: Is email required when adding a supplier?

oldOrderThreshold.label: Old Order Threshold (Days)
oldOrderThreshold.description: Number of days after which an order is considered old

pickupReminderDays.label: Pickup Reminder (Days)
pickupReminderDays.description: Days after arrival to remind customer for pickup

alertCheckInterval.label: Alert Check Interval (Minutes)
alertCheckInterval.description: How often to check for new alerts

notificationSound.label: Notification Sound
notificationSound.description: Play sound when a new notification appears

notifyOnNewOrder.label: Notify on New Order
notifyOnNewOrder.description: Send notification when a new order is added

notifyOnStatusChange.label: Notify on Status Change
notifyOnStatusChange.description: Send notification when order status changes

sidebarDefaultState.label: Default Sidebar State
sidebarDefaultState.description: Whether sidebar is open or collapsed on startup

itemsPerPage.label: Items Per Page
itemsPerPage.description: Number of items displayed per page

enableDevMode.label: Enable Developer Mode
enableDevMode.description: Show developer tools and test data

backupIntervalDays.label: Backup Interval (Days)
backupIntervalDays.description: How often to create a backup
